review: works well--- better without difficult keyboard.
author: Albert T Steelman

review: I love being able to get all my Amazon movies, music, TV shows. PLUS so much more. I have spent more hours than I care to admit watching, listening, playing on my TV these last few weeks. It made being a prime member even more fantastic!!! LOVE this Fire TV Stick
author: Dinadub

review: Good but some stuff missing:1. Over the air HDTV tab.2. Web browser.3. Flash player installed by default.4. Web navigation support in the remote control.5. Youtube app (not the website link).6. Google services so i can login to my Youtube account.Cheers!
author: Alex Reyes

review: It's not as good as I thought
author: Jonas Estevez

review: Did everything it advertised. I am ready to cut the cord!  Only thing I do not like is that if we are supposed to be getting a free month of Amazon Prime WHY do we have to pay for HD on certain episodes?  I probably will not renew the Prime because of this and the fact the selection does not seem very big.The rest is fantastic. Good job Amazon!
author: Keith A. Gerlach

review: Had a little trouble with the remote at first but great customer service and help me right away. Really enjoying it!!!
author: Kelly Shuman

review: No one product going be perfect to any consumer needs...for this product the pros outweighs the cons....The only 2 draw backs I have are:1. The fact the audio goes away when watching my prime videos. I have to restart the stick.2. All the amazon videos don't always load fully. And this is so even when  I have a very good wifi signal..Othewise...all the other features the family loves..kids love the games.
author: Nicko

review: Still trying to learn of its features but am satisfy with it....thank you!
author: mary

review: I'm really happy with this little stick. I have mostly used it with Plex, Netflix and ESPN, and it has performed well with all 3. It has a well polished UI that is reasonably quick, and at this price it is a strong value.
author: Aeschylus
